column4: You can remove /all/ the stuff installed in WINE by removing your ~/.wine folder, and ~/.local/share/wineprefixes too (IIRC) in certain cases.  Not sure about a single app.
kdkslll:  ...and follow the "sudo apt-get update" with a "sudo apt-get upgrade" to actually /install/ the updates rather than just get the computer aware of their existence.
yeah, the sudo apt-get upgrade is a companion.. :)
